personalAccessment:
I am a student of Software Technology and Application major graduating in 2018. I'm passionate abouth front-end development and familiar with the common process of industralized front-end development. I am eager to learn various new front-end technology, frameworks and tools and therefor been able to practice with frameworks and tools such as Vue.js, Sass and Webpack. 
I am sophisticated in English language and enthusiastic about community conferences, activities and communications. I have been part of the community translation group for the Chinese document of Vue.js 2.0. 
I'm also an optimistic person who are grounded in learning principles of computer science theories and keeps forever curious with new features, frameworks and technology in front-end development.
